longBusinessSummary: Laxmi Cotspin Limited engages in the manufacture, processing, and sale of textiles in India. The company offers cotton yarns, bales, seeds, lint, and oil; open end and blended yarns; fabrics; and oil cakes, wash oil, and oil sediment. It exports its products to Asian and European countries. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Jalna, India.
